name: The Forest (itch) (Koleta)
description:
Go on an adventure through the forest!

  • Features 6 levels including a Tutorial
  • Forage Mushrooms and Berries to open the way forward
  • Defeat Rabbits with a Bow and Arrow

Controls (Most of this is covered in the in-game tutorial):

  • WASD movement
  • Left Mouse Button to Aim
  • Right Mouse Button to Interact
  • Right Mouse Button while Aiming to Shoot
  • Left Shift to Run
  • Left Control to Crouch
  • Spacebar to Roll
  • E to open Inventory
  • Also E to close any Menus
  • U to reset level (incase anything goes wrong)
